body_html:
Good to know it has been fixed. Unfortunately I do not have the dev tools for windows set up currently (it is a lot less simple than under Linux, and not currently supported for end users), so I cannot build from source.

Any chance this can be cherrypicked for the v1.2.0 release?

body:
Good to know it has been fixed. Unfortunately I do not have the dev tools for windows set up currently (it is a lot less simple than under Linux, and not currently supported for end users), so I cannot build from source.

Any chance this can be cherrypicked for the v1.2.0 release?
